SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model.observer

Interface ITreeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
TreeView
public interface ITreeListener
ITreeListener defines methods for handling events related to changes in the tree. Implementations of this interface are notified of additions, removals, and selection changes in the tree.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onTreeElementAdded(TreeElement treeElement)
    Called when a TreeElement is added to the tree.
    void
    onTreeElementRemoved(TreeElement element)
    Called when a TreeElement is removed from the tree.
    void
    onTreeSelectionChanged(TreeViewSelection selection)
    Called when the TreeViewSelection was changed.
    void
    onUpdateTree()
    Called when the model has finished updating the tree.

      Called when a TreeElement is added to the tree.
      Parameters:

    • onTreeElementRemoved

      void onTreeElementRemoved(TreeElement element)
      Called when a TreeElement is removed from the tree.
      Parameters:
      element - TreeElement that was removed to the tree

    • onTreeSelectionChanged

      void onTreeSelectionChanged(TreeViewSelection selection)
      Called when the TreeViewSelection was changed.
      Parameters:
      selection - tree view selection that was changed

    • onUpdateTree

      void onUpdateTree()
      Called when the model has finished updating the tree.
